alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seneca, northeastern Schuyler, southeastern Yates, southwestern Cayuga and northwestern Tompkins Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caywood, or 8 miles east of Dundee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newfield, Hector, Starkey, Lansing, Enfield, Covert, Trumansburg, Ovid, Interlaken and Lodi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins; Yates
